history.proof: intros x u. unfold opp. unfold scal. qauto depth: 4 l: on use: scal_zero_l, @plus_reg_l, scal_one, scal_distr_r, @plus_opp_r unfold: opp, scal, ModuleSpace.AbelianGroup, AbelianGroup.sort, ModuleSpace.sort, Ring.AbelianGroup.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of scal_assoc (scal _ (scal _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
Found no subterm matching "mult ?M2584 (opp ?M2585)" in the current goal.

In environment K : Ring V : ModuleSpace K H1 : forall (x y : K) (u : V), scal x (scal y u) = scal (mult x y) u x : K u : V H0 : forall x y : K, opp (mult x y) = mult x (opp y) Unable to unify "AbelianGroup.opp V (ModuleSpace.class K V) (ModuleSpace.scal K (AbelianGroup.Pack V (ModuleSpace.class K V) V) (ModuleSpace.class K V) x u)" with "ModuleSpace.scal K (AbelianGroup.Pack V (ModuleSpace.class K V) V) (ModuleSpace.class K V) (AbelianGroup.opp K (Ring.class K) x) u".

original: intros x u. unfold opp. unfold scal. rewrite scal_assoc. rewrite <- opp_mult_r. reflexivity.
